snippet: Robin Roberts, whose return to “Good Morning America” after a rare blood disorder and bone marrow transplant has been widely covered this year, had something of a setback this month.
abstract: Robin Roberts, whose return to hosting Good Morning America after rare blood disorder and bone marrow transplant has received wide notice, is admitted to hospital to fight off infection; Roberts reassures her fans that such setbacks are common after marrow transplants.
lead_paragraph: Robin Roberts, whose return to “Good Morning America” after a rare blood disorder and bone marrow transplant has been widely covered this year, had something of a setback this month.
